Package ca.mcgill.ecse.mmss.integration

Class LoanIntegrationTests

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.ecse.mmss.integration.LoanIntegrationTests
@SpringBootTest(webEnvironment=RANDOM_PORT) public class LoanIntegrationTests extends Object
Tests the functionality of all services exposed through the URL "/loan"

  • Method Details

    • createObjects

      @BeforeEach public void createObjects()
      Creates the obejcts needed by all test cases. This is a BeforeEach because objects that are manipulated by certain calls should be reset for each test

    • deleteObjects

      @AfterEach public void deleteObjects()
      Deletes objects after each test

    • testCreateAndGetLoan

      @Test public void testCreateAndGetLoan()
      Tests creating and retrieving a loan

    • testCreateLoan

      public int testCreateLoan()
      Tests creating a loan, and returns its id
      Returns:
      the id of the loan

    • testGetLoan

      public void testGetLoan(int id)
      Retrieves the loan that was created by its id

      Tests updating a loan status to approved

    • addDays

      public Date addDays(Date date, int days)
      Helper method to increase a date by 1 day. Inspired by this Source: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15802010/how-to-add-days-to-java-sql-date
      Parameters:
      date - the date to add
      days - the integer number of days to add to the date
      Returns:
      the date increased by the given number of days

    • createAndSaveOpenDays

      public void createAndSaveOpenDays()
      Makes 10 open days that to be used for testing, and saves them to the database. All of these 10 days are after the current date
